name: createsecret
description: Create or generate a secret and store it into a Azure Key Vault.
author: Kevin Hagenaars

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure subscription for the key vault

inputs.name: KeyVaultName
inputs.label: Key vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of an existing key vault

inputs.name: SecretName
inputs.label: Name of the secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the secret that will be stored in the Key Vault.

inputs.name: SecretValue
inputs.label: Secret value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value of the secret that will be stored in the Key Vault. Keep empty to generate a strong secret value.

inputs.name: SecretLength
inputs.label: Length of the generated secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Length of the generated secret. Only applies when the custom value is empty.

inputs.name: ExcludeSpecialChars
inputs.label: Exclude special characters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Exclude the special characters (~!@#$%^&()_+-={}[];\,'.) from the generated secret. Only applies when the custom value is empty.
